name: syl6eqbrr
params: class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, wff w0

body.origin:
|- wi(w0, wbr(c0, c1, c2))
-| wi(w0, wceq(c0, c3))
-| wbr(c3, c1, c2)

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(w0, wbr(c0, c1, c2))
-| wi(w0, wceq(c0, c3))
-| wbr(c3, c1, c2)

body.origin:
|- wi(w0, wceq(c0, c3))
-| wi(w0, wceq(c3, c0))

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(w0, wbr(c0, c1, c2))
-| wbr(c3, c1, c2)
-| wi(w0, wceq(c3, c0))

comment: A chained equality inference for a binary relation. (Contributed by NM, 4-Jan-2006.)
